name: Ada Wai-Chee Fu
content: FU, Ada Waichee Associate Professor CSE, Faculty of Eng. ,CUHK B.Sc.(CUHK), M.S.,Ph.D.(Simon Fraser U) Ada Waichee Fu received her B.Sc degree in computer science in the Chinese University of Hong Kong in 1983, and both M.Sc and Ph.D degrees in Computer Science in Simon Fraser University of Canada in 1986, 1990, respectively; worked at Bell Northern Research in Ottawa, Canada from 1989 to 1993 on a wide-area distributed database project; joined the Chinese University of Hong Kong in 1993. Recommended reading: David Bentley Hart, "That All SHall Be Saved", Yale University Press, 2019. Research interests: database, data mining, and graph data analysis Teaching Fall 2017 : CSCI5120 : Advanced Topics in Database Systems Spring 2018 : CSCI3170 Introduction to Database Systems Graduate students Zitong Chen (PhD) Yang Wu (PhD) Alumni , * Doing research, * graduate study (1) , (2) , Advice Industrial Project on Data Mining (ITF funded) Professional Activities , cse corner , info , library , inspec , enquiry Publications , SHCC, UC , newsletter , +plus What lies beyond man made regulations ? Address: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shatin, N.T. Hong Kong Phone: +852-39438432 Fax: +852-26035024
